Everyone is full of possibilities.

Everything you do, moving forwards, stopping, closing, opening, is all in your hands.
There are many doors in this world.

To open them requires the Magic Key...

2 keys and 1 door...

2 wills and 1 body.

Once the doors are opened, the worlds will be connected and the great power revealed.

Finally got to visit that harbor specializing in Gunkan Suships that I've been curious about for a while! The premium "Shari" here is limited to 2000 Suships a year, and uses specially developed smooth aged rice, giving it extra boldness not found anywhere else.

The classy atmosphere made my heart sing, too.

The Gunkan Suship served had a perfect balance of vinegar, nigiri, shine, and shape, demonstrating exquisite artisanship.

The owner told me, "We are introducing rich yet mellow scented EDO-FRONT red vinegar in the near future," which I'm really looking forward to.

However, I was disappointed the surrounding seas were a little noisy...

so, giving it 4 stars with hope for improvements in the future.
